## Checklist

<!-- Verify all items before requesting review -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] Code follows project style guidelines (linter passes)
- [ ] Self-review completed
- [ ] Comments added for complex code
- [ ] No commented-out code
- [ ] No debug statements (console.log, print, etc.)

### Documentation

- [ ] Documentation updated (if needed)
- [ ] Event catalog updated (if new/changed events)
- [ ] API documentation updated (if API changes)
- [ ] README updated (if needed)
- [ ] ADR created (if significant architectural decision)

### Architecture & Design

- [ ] Follows Clean Architecture principles
- [ ] Uses appropriate design patterns
- [ ] Event schemas follow conventions (if applicable)
- [ ] Database migrations included (if schema changes)
- [ ] Feature flags used for incomplete/risky features

### Security

- [ ] No hardcoded secrets or credentials
- [ ] Input validation implemented
- [ ] No SQL injection vulnerabilities
- [ ] Sensitive data not logged
- [ ] Authentication/authorization correct

### Performance

- [ ] No N+1 query problems
- [ ] Appropriate use of async/await
- [ ] Caching considered where beneficial
- [ ] Database queries optimized

### Dependencies

- [ ] New dependencies justified and approved
- [ ] Dependencies updated (if applicable)
- [ ] No known vulnerabilities in dependencies
